column4: Hey guys, I'm thinking about migrating over to Ubuntu from XP, but I had a question.  I have my main desktop that I use, and I have an older box that just sits in my closet.  Currently on my XP machine, I have a dual monitor setup.  I am wondering if it would be easy to setup Ubuntu to work on my dual screen box, and then have a "headless" windows box with my older desktop that is currently not in use?
dunno what use a headless window box could be,,, but sure, if the hardware is supported by the linux kernel ubuntu installs, it should work fine... otoh, you can also have the ubuntu box headless
I like using Ubuntu mainly.  It's just that I want to still have windows to use things like iTunes to sync my iPhone, etc.
